name: womanliness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being womanly (= having the qualities, ideas, or physical features that a woman is typically or traditionally thought to have): Jane developed early into womanliness. She was young and unware of her womanliness. See
womanly
More examplesFewer examplesShe tried to use her womanliness to make him change his mind.She believes women in business should use their womanliness as an asset, rather than trying to be like a man.How were the Victorians' views on womanliness different to our own?
